rationale: The resolution of the patient's dizziness, including timeframe and perception of improvement, was not documented.
The patient's medication adherence challenges, including phone alarms and pill organizer suggestion, were not addressed.
The patient's current medication details, including dosage and frequency, were omitted.
There was no discussion of potential solutions to improve medication adherence.
No follow-up plan or further assessment related to the patient's epilepsy management was documented.
